member.name: T:Drill4Net.Injector.Engine.InjectorEngine
member.summary: High-level Injector Engine working with target directories and files. It injects the Agent's proxy code to the needed methods and produces the Tree metadata of processed entities (directories, assemblies, classes, methods, cross-points, etc)

member.name: M:Drill4Net.Injector.Engine.InjectorEngine.#ctor(Drill4Net.Injector.Core.IInjectorRepository)
member.summary: Create the Injector Engine working with target directories and files

member.name: M:Drill4Net.Injector.Engine.InjectorEngine.Process
member.summary: Inject the target accordingly by the current config from repository
member.returns: Tree of metadata for injected entities (processed directories, assemblies, classes, methods, cross-points, etc)

member.name: M:Drill4Net.Injector.Engine.InjectorEngine.Process(Drill4Net.Common.InjectorOptions)
member.summary: Inject the target accordingly by the config form parameters
member.returns: Tree data of injection (processed directories, assemblies, classes, methods, cross-points, and their meta-data)

member.summary: Process directory from current Engine's context

member.summary: Process file from current Engine's context
